long_description: With 24 efficient gears for hills and flats and a comfortable rider position, the Raleigh Mesika 1.0 women's bike is a well-equipped urban commuter for any budget. Butted aluminum frame features a women-specific geometry and a formed down tube for comfort and efficiency; flat handlebar encourages an upright riding position. Shimano crankset and front and rear derailleurs provide easy pedaling and shifting through all 24 speeds; the bike is geared for hills as well as flats. Tektro Novela disc brakes provide smooth, responsive deceleration and easy speed management. 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Kenda K-192 tires for excellent rolling performance on bike paths and streets alike. Convenient platform pedals work with most casual shoes. Eyelets accept fenders and rear rack (not included). The Raleigh Mesika 1.0 women's bike specs are subject to change.
